| HistoryText             = The cult of the Dark Lord was a voodoo cult led by [[Desmond Drew (Earth-616)|Black Talon]] and his mother, [[Mama Limbo (Earth-616)|Mama Limbo]]. They abducted and sacrificed young women as a scheme to rejuvenate Mama Limbo based on a process learned from the Countess Elizabeth Bathory. When [[Jericho Drumm (Earth-616)|Brother Voodoo]] exposed the true purpose of the rituals, the angry cultists killed their leaders and supposedly disbaned the cult{{r|Strange Tales #172|173}}{{r|Zombie Vol 1 6}}.
